comment.text: May link EHMT1 and EHMT2 histone methyltransferases to the CTBP corepressor machinery. May be involved in EHMT1-EHMT2 heterodimer formation and stabilization (By similarity).
Interacts with EHMT1, EHMT2, CTBP1 and CTBP2 (By similarity). Part of a complex containing at least CDYL, REST, WIZ, SETB1, EHMT1 and EHMT2.
The C2H2-type zinc finger 11 mediates interaction with EHMT1 and EHMT2.
Belongs to the krueppel C2H2-type zinc-finger protein family.

property.value: Expressed in cortical plate and 220 other tissues
F:RNA polymerase II transcription corepressor binding
P:positive regulation of nuclear cell cycle DNA replication
